website_summaries.verdict: Apple's basic wired earbuds with Lightning Connector plugin.
pros: Reliable headphones for listening to music and making calls
Relatively comfortable for hard plastic in-ear buds
cons: Only compatible with newer generations of Apple devices (unless you use an adapter)

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: THESE ARE NOT APPLE
customer_reviews.text: I use my earbuds for singing and immediately noticed a change in the mic quality. Even the texture is different. But I thought hey, still a good deal! Fast forward two months. These things just crackled and sent little mini shock of electric into my ears while listening to a voicenotes in iMessage! Like the kind of quick spark you get when you rub your feet on a carpet and touch someone. But continuous. I yanked them out and threw them in the trash. I’ll go buy from Apple website now. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaC

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke??
customer_reviews.text: I just got the headphones like this ! Open and empty box 😡
customer_reviews.author: The Velez de Villa

customer_reviews.title: It's driving me crazy and is a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Bought less than a month ago and they are already on the fritz. They keep activating voice control, cutting off whatever I'm currently using them for (listening to audio, talking hands-free). It's driving me crazy and is a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for original earphones
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally left my IPhone 7 headphones on a plane when traveling with family. These work as well as the original ones. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Patti NP

customer_reviews.title: Legit Apple Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Well, i would give these earphones a 5 star rating. but the only problem or the issue i see was the packaging they arrive in. The earphones work perfectly fine in terms of sound quality and seems to me very authentic Apple earphones. Having discussed the issue about packaging to the seller, they informed me that the earphones come in this e-commerce packaging and apparently claiming it to be bona fide Apple product. As long as the product is working fine, I am good. 4 stars only because of the packaging but i believe thats the reason for the product being low cost.
customer_reviews.author: AAR.

customer_reviews.title: Armstrong Group
customer_reviews.text: The negative reviews are correct. I can’t believe this. I purchased from The Armstrong Group. My earphones on first day of use are cutting in and out. And I heard a static noise in the right ear. The next day, heard an even weirder noise, and the lightning connector was literally hot like an oven. I’m too afraid to use anymore in case it gets stuck in my iPhone or just destroys it. $25 is not cheap to waste. Thank you to Amazon for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: don’t WORK. don’t BUY ITS FAKE ALL REVIEWS ARE ...
customer_reviews.text: don’t WORK. don’t BUY ITS FAKE ALL REVIEWS ARE FAKE. IT JUST BEEPS WHEN U PLUG IT IN
customer_reviews.author: Nylon

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds are Janky at Best. So why are you mad?
customer_reviews.text: I am quite surprised at how many people are claiming that these didn’t work after a short time, considering majority of us are replacing the earbuds that came with our phone/purchased from the Apple Store. After paying for my third pair(I had two pairs replaced under warranty) in two almost three years, if these last six months we’re doing great. The sound works, people can hear me talking to them, and my earbuds are no longer randomly ending calls or playing music. So. They’re perfect, until they like all other earbuds fall apart or jump out my purse for freedom.
customer_reviews.author: The Daylight

customer_reviews.title: Check This Out
customer_reviews.text: These headphones arrived in the official Apple package. I'm an audio engineer so I compared them to the headphones that came with my iPhone and they sound exactly the same. If it is a fake it's a damn good one.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to waste my money on something that worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: I had these less than a week and they shorted out in one ear. I was disappointed to waste my money on something that worked for one week. I won't be buying these again here.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: They’re authentic
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was TERRIFIED of buying these on amazon, but I took the risk and went through with it anyway because I was too lazy to walk to Apple - and I couldn’t be happier about it. The headphones were both sold and fulfilled by Amazon, and they’re the real deal + work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: immasb

customer_reviews.title: BOTH PAIRS BROKE WITHIN A MONTH OF NORMAL USE!!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy. I don’t believe these are genuine Apple products!! Both pair I bought broke within a month of purchasing. The 1st pair quit working in one ear & (see pic) the second pair just came apart. The Seller OCG Buys replaced the 1st pair that broke, but accused me of dropping the second pair (which I didn’t) & they would not replace them. BUYER BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: amie h fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Not refurbished . Disgustingly filthy.
customer_reviews.text: Ocean reef electronics advertised these as refurbished . They are just plain used . They have actual ear wax in each of the four ear buds (I purchased 2 pair). The cords are dirty and grey, the seams around the volume control and earbuds are black with filth. They look like mine normally do after a couple months use which is nice enough but this is some strangers ear wax and nastiness . Not refurbished at all. So gross .
customer_reviews.author: steve ford

customer_reviews.title: Cracked earphones
customer_reviews.text: I took these out of the packaging and they appeared cracked. And they are. I almost forgot about it bc I was so disgusted I was using the jack to use other earphones but now that’s not working and I have cracked earphones. I try to give the benefit of the doubt but for a like new product - That’s pretty crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yikes - gave to college daughter as gift - stopped working after a month!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these well in advance of my daughter's birthday (I guess not so smart given their limited return/guarantee window). I gave them to her in mid January 2019, and they stopped working already, after less than a month! Seller would not take them back. For context, she's a very conscientious college student, and not hard on electronics like her younger brother. But I am writing this review so that others know what an unreliable product this is. Would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaColorado

customer_reviews.title: These aren't just fakes, they're really bad fakes
customer_reviews.text: You can tell right off from the labeling on the box that doesn't match real EarPods. Then you open the box and there is no case for the EarPods - they are just wrapped around a piece of cardboard. Then you look and the volume control is in the wrong spot and not the right color. The plastic is cheap and lightweight, especially apparent in the flimsy plastic wires. The piece of plastic that wraps around the manual and warranty is actually made of paper. Just Google "how to tell fake earpods". These will fail every single test. And two weeks later, they are already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: They're legit.
customer_reviews.text: They're definitely Apple EarPods and work great. I needed a new pair as I gave my old one away to a friend who needed them and used Mpow bluetooth headphones instead but the Apple EarPods are amazing to use for phone calls so I wanted to get a new pair and these are perfect. All the reviews saying they're "fake" are either really old reviews (I can't speak for back then), fake reviews, or just have no idea what they're talking about. If you're looking to buy a new pair of Apple EarPods, just get these.
customer_reviews.author: kanuhobrewer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money!! They stopped working within 2 weeks of normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Tobar

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these earphones. I purchased them in April, and figured since it’s an apple product then should be good. Price was good, so little skeptical to begin with. When they arrived they looked like genuine apple product, and worked fine for first few months. Then one side stopped working, and other side made crackly sound. Was hoping these would last longer than a few months. When they did work, they worked pretty well, but can’t give good rating, as didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Overall Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The EarPods that I received, had average sound quality and were comfortable. However there were two major problems that came with mine. Within the first week of usage I noticed that the volume buttons did not work. While this was a disappointment it wasn’t a dealbreaker so I did not return them. After less than a month of usage, the second major problem occurred when I found that the end of the Lightning cable was corroded.(Photo) The EarPods are now essentially useless, since every time I plug it to my phone I can’t hear anything from them. Overall I’m really disappointed that this product had only one month of real usage.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Bravo

customer_reviews.title: ITS TOTALLY REAL & BY APPLE!! 😊
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to drop this quick review. When I was looking to purchase this a few days ago, I saw a few reviews saying it wasn’t the real deal from Apple, well I’m here to say I just opened my package and YEAH THEY ARE THE REAL DEAL FROM APPLE. Good to know Amazon is doing right by its customers. However I don’t blame others thinking otherwise there’s still lots of confusion out there when buying these types of products. You just hope you’re getting the real deal. Hope that improves in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: They broke in less than a week!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds didn't last one week! The very tip of the plug end stayed in the phone when I went to unplug it. I had to get a pliers to get the piece that was stuck in my phone! The sound wasn't the greatest but I was putting up with that because of the cost I paid. Now it's complete garbage....waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Failed within minutes.
customer_reviews.text: These looked like OEM headphones and came packaged as new however after two songs they quit working. When I went to pull the connector out it was so hot I thought it was going to start melting. I was on a plane and I’m sure the smell of burning electronics would not have gone over well. Now I just hope it didn’t ruin the USB port on my iPhone...
customer_reviews.author: Dobb

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a week of arriving
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. The first pair worked great until my cat ate the cord. Since they worked so well, I bought a second pair. They stopped working within a week of getting them. I can count on one hand the number of times I was able to use these headphones. I am sorely disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were used but worked great came fast and perform extremely nice absolutely perfect love this buy
customer_reviews.author: Chada

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this review asks for "battery life" as these are not battery-operated? At any rate, these headphones work well, came packaged in an Apple box, and seem to be the real deal. My original pair (that came with my iPhone X) died after about 18 months so I'm happy to have found this replacement that appears to be of identical quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: they were used but they didn't have that nice sound crisp quality the newer apple headphones had
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these were the previous generation apple headphones, regardless, they were used but they didn't have that nice sound crisp quality the newer apple headphones had.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Flowers~

customer_reviews.title: They work. They have held up.
customer_reviews.text: Work with my iPhone 8plus perfectly. Zero issues. Have travelled with them and toss them in my bag and they’ve held up. Sharing because I’ve ordered crappy chargers and cases online so wanted to let others know these are legit, functioning EarPods compatible with iPhones. Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lilo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but like all Apple products expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter so my review is based on her feedback. Overall she is very happy with them. Says they have great sound quality, work well and cancel extraneous background noise such as me yelling at her to clean her room. Only issue I have with them is that they are over priced like most Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good, but always breaks eventually
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are good — I mean, it’s Apple for goodness sake. They’re high quality for the most part (sound/noise cancellation) however, the headphones have a tendency to break within a few months. The lightning cord attachment that connects the headphones to the iPhone ALWAYS detaches off of the headphones and gets stuck in the iPhone charger area. I think it’s because the headphones don’t have a sturdy wire... it’s just thin plastic. Other than that, they’re good. But keep in mind that paying for new headphones every three months (after the lightning cord breaks) adds up quick! That’s about $80+ a year on 4+ headphones bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Apple 🍎 EarPods
customer_reviews.text: I got an Apple iPhone XR last week, and liked the lightning charger earphones that come with it (although I think the audio quality is better from a dedicated headphone jack). Wanted a spare, ordered these in February 2019, ships and sold by Amazon. White Box is genuine Apple, says created by Apple in California, made in Vietnam. Sealed, new Apple box. They work the same and are the same construct as my iPhone XR earphones. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: WayneChicagoTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With Apple
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people bash these earphones but I've always thought the quality is superb and the sound quality excellent. Like anything else with wires and connectors, they'll eventually die, but for the money, you get a quality set of earphones that'll last a few years of hard use. This is based on years of using these exact earphones (it just happens to be the first time I bought them on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not the Longest Lasting
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the actual pod design of the headphone, (can't stand the rubber headphones in my ear) these are not the longest lasting pair of headphones. I bought this current pair Feb 19, 2019 and they stopped working yesterday 6/21/19. I don't know if it's just because I use my headphones every single day. And for long periods of time (likely the case) but if you want extremely long lasting headphones and you use them constantly then these aren't for you. If you don't use them nearly that much then they are more likely to suit what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great EarPods for iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Lightning Connector EarPods today , came a day early . There is a difference in the EarPods , the port is different , if you have a newer version of iPhone , I have iPhone 11 , I don’t have to use any phone adapter or anything to use these EarPods. It’s really Apple , came in apple box, it’s not knockoff , so far sound is good , will update any new changes , please click like if you found my review helpful . Thank you . Update Few days in , my ear pods sound is not clear not through on one end , getting a new replacement hope it better this time .
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Legit Apple Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I think some of the other reviewers may have had bad luck with their orders or had someone maliciously return counterfeit items. The ones I received are legit, they are clean, they have a microphone, sound quality is clear, packaging was neat and orderly and the box had the seal unbroken on the top so you can pull out the headphones from the box. Additionally the manufacturing label on the bottom was correct “Designed by Apple in California, Made in Vietnam” The box includes the product booklet and 1 year warranty booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Kodaki

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Thought that ordering this with the "Sold by/Fulfilled" by Amazon would be worth the risk given the reviews but less than a week after owning these headphones, I'm already having issues with them. The volume/play+pause buttons will randomly stop working and I have to plug and replug them multiple times to regain a connection. The sound also drops out and starts playing out of my iPhone X fairly frequently. Never had these issues with the headphones that came w/ my phone originally.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work for iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: I never write a review but I am very upset with this purchase. I currently have an iPhone 7 which it says it’s compatible with. I purchased these back in Jan. They worked until 4 months later and they crapped out randomly. Then I purchase them again. This time they don’t work in my phone. AT ALL. They work in newer iPhone models but not mine. It could be due to the fact that my phone is the 7 and not a newer version. But regardless, don’t advertise these headphones to work for a 7 if they don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Mash23

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement if you want EarPods
customer_reviews.text: If you’re familiar with EarPods, these are them. If you have not used ear pods and you’re trying to decide if you would like them or not, sorry. No help hear. Get it? No help hear. I meant no help here, in this review. But I used hear instead of here. Because it’s headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I guess
customer_reviews.text: For $5 dollars more you can get the real headphones at the Apple store. These look authentic but immediately following the unpackaging you can feel the difference. I was desperate for headphones so these will do until they give up on me, but I would of rather paid a couple bucks more for better quality
customer_reviews.author: Vannia LaHoz

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: NO, they are NOT as good as a 100$ set of buds/phones. But then again, they are GREAT for a 20$ set. As others have said, just be careful as you browse that you are sticking with a legit Apple seller/unit. Somehow Amazon allows a potential item to be viewed and then a different item to be purchased if you are not exacting in your browsing. Maybe it is like Google with its paid for ad listings and generally insidious redirects(if you search for JIFFY LUBE on Google but the first few listings are OTHER lube shops, how does that work??). Apple device from Apple and you are good to go. Apple looking device from NON-Apple source = crap shoot.
customer_reviews.author: PDXMartin

customer_reviews.title: Sound great on an iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I ordered these headphones as I have always liked the sound of the original Apple headphones. I just can’t believe I waited so long to get them. I have several of the old headphones but ever since I got my iPhone 8 I have not tried the new headphones as I got them used and didn’t come with some. These help me use something while my Bose sport headphones charge. Very happy I got them.
customer_reviews.author: FS Real Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Likely not legitimate Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Right out of the box, the mic only worked properly when inserted on a specific side in the lightning port. I marked that side with a marker and didn’t really care too much about the mild inconvenience. Fast forward 3 weeks and the mic is getting worse to where the other person on a phone call can’t even hear me speak. It’s trash. I am convinced that this is not an actual Apple product. Save your money and make sure you just purchase from Apple. These WILL fail on you.
customer_reviews.author: Es El Si Boy

customer_reviews.title: Left ear 50% quieter than right
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones and they came defected right out of the package. The sounds coming out of the left ear were about 50% less loud than the right which made it appear as though only the right ear was working. I dont know if this is a common problem when buying these headphones but that is what happened with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ig

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure If They're Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if these are a genuine Apple product. They look just like the originals that came with my husband's iPhone but they dont have any Apple logo or standard Apple packaging. However, mu husband says they work great and sound just like the originals so he is happy with them. For the price, they're great. Usually these go for twice the price in the Apple store.
customer_reviews.author: Ally J

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted 3 weeks and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and I was convinced these were authentic, but after buying a couple pair and using one of them for 3 weeks, I am no longer convinced. They look authentic down to the Apple box and packaging. However, they ones that came with my iphone lasted almost 2 years until I left them on a plane. The ones I bought from Amazon stopped working after 3 weeks. I'm within the return policy so that's fine, but now my headphone jack seems glitchy. I also bought two pair and they are slightly different color white. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: JasonKohl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for exactly a month and one of the ears already stopped working. I rarely use these headphones because they are left at work for when I have down time. Very disappointed wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Dahleen

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget you need an adapter!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my daughter for Christmas she got the cordless ones with her phone and had issues with them and then they were stolen at school, so these were gotten as a replacement, she likes the corded ones much better, glad we knew you needed the adapter before getting them, it's a new Apple product so I don't know why they didn't come with the right ends to plug into the new apple phones, but they don't you need an adapter, might be something to let people know? But they work as good and according to my daughter better than the cordless apple headphones
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 8 and I’ve tried a couple of other EarPods that were absolutely horrible! The sound was horrible on both, only one ear piece worked on one, and one completely broke after 5 minutes of use. I was trying to save some money, so I brought off label. I received these EarPods today, and boy what a difference!!!! The sound is great (so far)! I was able to hear and have an entire conversation. I would definitely recommend these to family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: Isa Bella

customer_reviews.title: All right but not stellar/very good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to replace the same ones to use with my wife's Iphone 7Plus so now I have a spare for the next time. The price is all right, $10.00 cheaper that at the source but this is the second time that I have to do it. My wife is quite gentle with them but first one side stopped working and then the other. They have not been abused and, as I said earlier, this is the second time I buy a replacement. In a way it doesn't sound fair to give a mix review for something that may last 20 years so in 20 years I may have to write an update.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Chiappe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have stopped buying apple headphones a long time ago, it’s a rip off. I am very happy with the quality. The sound is nice, they look great, I listen to music a lot and needed something for my conference calls as well - for the price it’s a steal. More importantly if you are a heavy user like me, you can buy them again and often if/when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: So I have these headphones and I order them June 11 I have had them now for a little over a month... randomly while I am speaking on the phone a very high pitched ringing will happen the first time it happened I thought it was the emergency noise. But then if kept happening and there was no emergency... also there are times I will be listening to music and all of a sudden my music is no longer coming from the headphones but instead from the phone..not very happy
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The real deal! Apple EarPods
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my EarPods and saw there was a lightning deal on these. I was very happy to get an original product that works well. The audio sounds good and I also recorded sound and the mic worked great. I’m very happy with this purchase and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: “Amazon’s Choice” are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I saw all of the reviews claiming these earbuds were knockoffs or third party, but I took a chance and ordered them anyway. The ones marked “amazon’s choice” are 100% the Apple brand earbuds I was looking for. They work just as expected and I can’t help but think that most of these negative reviews have to do with people not properly reading the product descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They are really good!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll leave a quick concise review. These are great, the quality is the same as the headphones that my phone came with. I love them, and I've been using them for a week and they have held up. I use AirPods during the day and these cabled ones at night and the quality is the great. These are not exactly meant to be noise cancelling but I guess if you have the volume loud enough. They come with a mic and volume controls which is what I wanted. All in all, I would buy more and recommend to anyone that asks.
customer_reviews.author: Alexlpz316

customer_reviews.title: original Apple's, n great price, ships from and sold by Amazon.com which I liked best
customer_reviews.text: What did I like? My headline said it all. These original Apple ear pods are perfectly working fine. The price was so good, ship from and sold by Amazon.com, which I liked best. What did I dislike? Before my purchase, I was confused by a top negative review out there with hundreds of people found it helpful. And then, I kept on reading dozens of other reviews out there. I even went on reading the real product info at Apple's website, before I decided to buy it. At Amazon.com, some misleading reviews out there that I disliked most. Stay safe ~
customer_reviews.author: alex 3D

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two pairs and neither worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item twice from this manufacturer. The first pair arrived and one earbud didn’t work. I quickly ordered another pair as I needed them for work and when the second pair arrived the input was for a regular input not Lightning. I had to use the one earbud one to take calls and couldn’t return it used, but it’s frustrating to waste money as I need to now buy a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M

customer_reviews.title: Apple is still making the best for the dollar on these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and pretty comfortable to wear. The sound quality is excellent compared to other brands I’ve used. Noise cancellation is passive and it’s coincidental. The switch that is on the wire to the right side ear pod is a little quirky at times, it doesn’t always restart the song after you pause the music and results in you pressing it multiple times or finding the phone to restart the music. Can be frustrating if you get interrupted many times during your listening session. Overall excellent quality and very little to gripe about.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these earbuds. The price was good and the packaging was nice. They arrived on time and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I pulled the white plastic as I unplug it from my phone.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine like two weeks ago, and look at the picture I attached. Next time just walk in to your nearest Apple shop.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the headphones, one earbud only works half the time and noise crackles
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this apple product, I've been a loyal apple/mac user my whole life (thanks dad). I was super excited for the convenience of these headphones but half the time only the right ear bud works, and the left does not, there does not seem to be a pattern to it. It's also frustrating because when I'm on the phone with people, the voices crackle, almost like I'm losing service, even when my phone is on me. I don't know if I got a bad product or what, but I wouldn't recommend them, nor purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earpods on the market. You don't know how many times I accidentally left them in pants pocket, then washed and dried them. Only to find them intact and still working. I'm amazed. They also fit extremely comfortably in my ear. They have a new pro design and they're awful. I'll stick with this classic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had it with these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them when working in the yard or house the wire near the connection gets damaged easily if worn in a pocket, only work for a couple months. I live in rural WI and can’t use anything that requires Wifi. I have had a few of these and they never last. I am finally fed up. Maybe if all you do is sit in one spot they will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting, for me at least
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for almost a year now (been close to 11 months I think), and these were definitely worth the price for how long they’ve lasted. They’ve survived three cycles in the washing machine because I forgot them in my pocket, and while I wouldn’t recommend making the same mistake, I’m glad they still work just as good as they did when I first got them. For me, these have lasted a great amount of time considering the accidents it’s been out through.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Farooqi

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Purchase- These headphones broke within the first 5 weeks of owning them. Since they were outside of the four week window for returning to Amazon I was told to go directly to Apple to see if anything could be done under the warranty. Apple could not identify the part number so my guess is that this is not a true Apple product. Called Amazon again and they referred me to the seller. The seller has not responded to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Mariniello

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has so many flaws I cannot believe it was designed by Apple let alone the 2nd generation of the product. I returned this product twice using the Apple Care I purchased. Both times the case would not charge using a Mophie charging pad. I finally gave up and just plug it in to charge. The other problem with this device is that the left Airpod does not charge consistently. Probably due to the tolerances in the charging case being off. I stuck a piece of paper in the slot to make a tighter fit. Sad - Apple are you listening?
customer_reviews.author: J. Ohlman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones ever. Don’t buy these unless you want the cheapest made, most rotten sound available. I have never written a bad review. I can check that off my list now. Horrible. Sound quality is bad, doesn’t even connect 4 of 5 times. Strange feedback sound when it does connect that drowns out the sound. Do yourself a favor and buy real Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Rayve

customer_reviews.title: Still love 'em
customer_reviews.text: In this day and age where Airpods and Airpods Pro reign supreme, I still enjoy using these earpods as they are easy to just plug in and go. I don't have to worry about losing them, and the sound is comparable if not the same to Airpods (maybe not the Pro version). Apart from that, being plugged in means no charging and although Airpods are said to have fast charging speeds, they also supposedly lose that charge just as fast. Whether you prefer a more reliable approach or simply want a backup pair to compliment your Airpods, these are a great choice (for a great price).
customer_reviews.author: Jason Backman

customer_reviews.title: These are authentic Apple product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my ear buds today. Almost didn't order them since several reviews questioned if they were knockoffs or genuine Apple. Mine came in genuine Apple packaging with all genuine Apple documentation. They are Apple and they are great. Very happy to have saved $10 from the price on Apple.com
customer_reviews.author: deborah w. slick

customer_reviews.title: Microphone stopped working properly - Amazon would not replace even though they were the seller.
customer_reviews.text: The microphone stopped working properly after about 1 month. Chatted with amazon and they said I needed to call Apple. Called Apple and they were unable to help me get the unit I bought replaced. Not a happy amazon customer after Amazons response to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: The pricing, the delivery; everything was as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I am at an age, 80, where I have hearing issues. Just recently my nephew, who is an engineer and a techie was here visiting me and besides riding motorcycles and grilling steaks he saw that I have hearing issues. He told me to order Apple Ear Pods on Amazon and he would set up my iPad to make phone calls through Facebook, don’t ask me how he did it but it worked. The Ear Pods were delivered within a couple of days as promised and when I made my first phone call with the EarPods I could not believe the clarity that the EarPods delivered.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in the beginning of March and have used them very lightly. Within the first month, one of the earbuds sound stopped working completely. Within 2 months the cord ripped and wire was showing (as pictured). By the 3rd month, they are unusable. While I’m on work calls, they will glitch and increase/decrease volume, sometimes even hang up on whoever I’m speaking with. My last earbuds from Apple lasted for years. I’m guessing there’s a reason that these are cheaper. Possibly a really good knock off? Either way, save yourself the time by spending ten extra bucks on the real thing through the Apple website. These were very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Zia

customer_reviews.title: This is the 4th pair I've bought and I'm getting sick of it
customer_reviews.text: These things do not last. Normally the problem I have is wear and tear, usually, part of the wire becomes exposed and one of the earbuds loses sound. That's fine nothing lasts forever and I can still use at least one earbud until a replacement arrives. This time I'm annoyed though. This time the problem is the mic/audio control piece on the right earbud. Right now it's broken and it keeps automatically turning the volume on my phone down. Seriously who uses this stupid thing? there are buttons on the side of the phone to turn off the sound, who actually? Sickos that's who. These earbuds made me a Ted Kaczynski apologist, but I'm still gonna keep buying them though.
customer_reviews.author: Don Nortan

customer_reviews.title: just like the originals.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I’m not near an Apple store and I’m not going to downtown seattle anyway. These headphones work exactly like the original headphones that came with my phone. I like headphones with a chord over blu tooth for two reasons; one, the chord makes them harder to lose, and two, I’m not sure sending a signal into my hear via WiFi is that good for my brain. I could be wrong, but I’ll stick to the headphones with a chord.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Legit Apple product.
customer_reviews.text: These are legit Apple ear pods. I’m not sure why people are complaining about the quality and legitimacy. They have never had a reputation for having great sound. But they are what they say they are. They are good for working out, and for listening to audio off your phone. I received the ones require for lightning port (using iPhone 7 Plus) the volume + - buttons work and they have a built in Mic to answer calls and talk with the ear pods on.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Did not noise cancel and intermittently mic stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I got these earpods and they appeared to be apple brand and look just like my last pair. Unfortunately about a month after I received them they started cutting out when I was talking to people and the people I was talking to began to report that they couldn't hear me unless I was sitting very still. If I was moving at all they reported a ton of back ground noise they described as crackling and rubbing. I have since bought another pair from apple directly and they work fabulous. Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement set of earbuds and purchased these knowing that Apple products are among the best. As suspected, these are great. They arrived quickly, fit comfortably in my ears and have great sound quality. They even have a volume control button on the cord so you can adjust the volume without having to handle your phone/device. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone looking for top quality earbuds . Note: these are not cordless, wireless/bluetooth earpods - they have a cord and attach to whatever device you are trying to listen to or talk through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one set of Apple EarPods with lightning connectors on 5/1/20. Right channel stopped working after 7 weeks. I bought second set on 7/7/20. Left channel stopped working one month later. I just bought third set on 8/16/20. How long will these last? I thought Apple made a decent product that would last 6 months or more. I already spent more than 60 bucks for these things! Does Apple know these EarPods are pretty much junk? really kind of disheartening. Might as well buy after market EarPods for fraction of cost.They'll probably last just as long!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: Actual Apple Earpods
customer_reviews.text: I know I was skeptic at first with some reviewers claiming it was an off-brand of Apple, but the ones I received were authentic earpods from Apple. This is a great product and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good News / Bad News
customer_reviews.text: GOOD NEWS: I bought mine from Amazon a few months ago. I believe them to be the genuine Apple product which originally came with my Iphone. They sound fantastic. At less than $14 each, luckily, I had originally purchased and received two sets. I highly recommend them. BAD NEWS: When I attempted to buy additional sets to store extras in our vehicles, I received a notification indicating I had already reached my limit. I just noticed they are now being offered but at a higher price. I'm lucky to have originally stumbled across a great deal a few months ago and am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love apple earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have been using iphone for more than 10 years. I tried other brand earbuds but have to say that the original earbuds coming with iphone are the best. All other brands may look like the original ones and they may be good at beginning. However, after some time, maybe a few months, they are broken, without exception. This product was in promotion so I am happy I can buy two sets of iphone earbuds with discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie W.

customer_reviews.title: These Are Genuine Apple EarPods
customer_reviews.text: I generally use these EarPods to speak on my iPhone 8 plus. For those who complain that these are not genuine Apple EarPods you get what you pay for. Don’t just look at ghe product description also look at the product specifications. It will list the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz1152

customer_reviews.title: Quit working day after return period ended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Apple brand for my husband to use with his iPhone after a cheaper variety he thought was Apple quit after a couple of weeks. The last Apple earpods he had lasted for a few years! The volume control and on/off switch quit working today, one day after the return period ended. These were expensive and a complete waste of money. I'm pretty disgusted that we can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard apple product. Sure, they don't last forever. But most electronics don't. I'm happy with these and don't have to worry about the little adapter piece that came with my iphone X. This one is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Clark

customer_reviews.title: They're the official Apple Earbuds by Apple.
customer_reviews.text: They work they're apple earpods. Don't confuse them with the air pods notice "air" because those are wireless. Ear pods EAR are wired just to be clear for anyone wondering what the difference was.. Anyways these weren't for me but they worked. Sound quality is mediocre find something else but if you want the official Apple earpods with the lighting connection these are it so I can confirm that.
customer_reviews.author: Stealth_Touch

customer_reviews.title: Defective item- no Amazon support
customer_reviews.text: Item had loose wire that broke after using 1 month but 15 days after return period and there is no one to talk to at amazon
customer_reviews.author: Varda Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Almost feel like “knock-offs” as they don’t fit the ear canals as they used to. 😩😩😩
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’m surprised if these are Apple brand as the box says. They hurt the ears because they don’t fit well. But the sound diminishes in one ear and they aren’t the same as the ear buds as those which come with the former Apple playing devices. Very uncomfortable. Bought twice thinking one could be a mistake...but now I don’t trust the “Apple brand” (iF these ARE actually from the Apple factory.) 😢
customer_reviews.author: Book Maven

customer_reviews.title: Not Apple Quality
customer_reviews.text: After receiving these earbuds, they worked great. Looked and felt like the REAL DEAL. According to the packaging, they are an Apple product. However, after having them for 2 months the covering started to crack, exposing the wire and the volume control stopped working. I'm very disappointed and looking for a replacement pair that is better quality than these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: Broke As Soon As the Return Period Expired
customer_reviews.text: Initially I bought a pair of these earbuds and loved them. So, I ordered this second set. However, as soon as the window to return them expired, they broke. They were not misused in any way. One side now is completely dead. These are too expensive to replace every 30 days, and should last much longer. Also, the second pair does not look like the first pair that I received, even though the packaging was identical. I would like to receive a replacement pair for these. Overall, I'm annoyed and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been.m having issues with this item. I have an iPhone 7+ and when we plug it in the other person on line tells me I can’t hear clear. So I remove it and turn around and then they say okay I can hear you know. So we were like okay just mark the side that works. Well nope it happens over and over. It sucks that we bought this and supposedly it supports Apple but it really doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Szo

customer_reviews.title: So good to have for phone calls and multitasking
customer_reviews.text: I lost these (well someone stole them) and what I loved about them is when I needed to use my phone for multi tasking I could do it. For example talking to my boss but accessing emails for her which a huge help.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I believe I. Guaranteed products. This appears not to be guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday to listen to music while I ride the metro. I was going to get them directly from apple but this seemed like a better deal until today. They just stopped working and now I find out my 30 days are up. This is sad I missed my return opportunity by 2 weeks. I really would appreciate if Amazon would replace them. If not buy from apple directly It’s worth the money if they guarantee their products. So now I’m out a product. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Good price for apple ear pods but competitors make a better product
customer_reviews.text: The background noise for the person your talking can be terrible. I gave these to my friend to use and when I talk to him I hear more noise and commotion in the background then it should. It hard to have long coverage in a busy environment. The ear pod isn’t that comfortable about they break after about a month or two when using them while working. Good price for apple ear pods but could be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Foster

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn’t work for iPhone 7 as promised.
customer_reviews.text: The lightning connector is too small for the Apple 7 phone. It fir my iPad, though, but when I tried to record while wearing the EarPods, and I replayed the recording, the sound quality was terrible. The technicians I chatted with were very helpful. Although they feel there was a factory defect, I’m retiring the product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Leonhard

customer_reviews.title: These seem like authentic Apple earbuds to me.
customer_reviews.text: They came in an Apple box (the beautiful rigid packaging you expect from Apple) and they seem exactly like my old earbuds in a side-by-side comparison (including sound quality). A few customers are questioning whether these are knockoffs due to the reduced price: in my case, they seem to be authentic Apple earbuds. I will update this review if I learn otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: One earpiece stops working - Dont throw away the box
customer_reviews.text: Within a few months of owning these, the right earpiece stopped playing audio altogether. The connector moves around in the jack, causing tracks to start playing and/or skip on their own. Apple has made us jump through hoops trying to get this resolved through the 1year warranty, which in the end they did not honor. My daughter threw the box out after getting them for her birthday, and apparently they have no other way to prove they are Apple products (even with the Apple on them and the receipt).
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Traskos

customer_reviews.title: So Good I have 3 Pairs!
customer_reviews.text: --If this review helped you, please click "helpful"-- These are great! I have 3 pairs of them. They sit comfortably in my ears. I really like the toggle on the cord. It makes it really easy to pause and skip songs as well as talk to Siri. --For more Amazon reviews, follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram--
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: I received an empty package.
customer_reviews.text: These might be wonderful but I received an empty package. Amazon says I can get a refund if I return the item but there’s nothing to return. In all my years of amazon shopping this is a first, so I’m not too PO’d, just irritated
customer_reviews.author: Easy Share Fan

customer_reviews.title: They were used, and probably not actual Apple headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I needed new headphones, and these were in my purchase history. I honestly don’t remember buying before from here, but this time I took them out of the box, and just plugged into my phone without thinking. Then I noticed that the cord was frayed at the top. Upon further inspection I noticed earwax In the headphones that was definitely not mine! Gross ! Especially with covid going around, I don’t want to put anything in my ears that someone else has used. The quality of the headphones was fine, but after that I’m just gonna buy a new pair .
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a little bit
customer_reviews.text: The head set worked for a month and then have so much static that I can’t use them again. Out of all of the headsets I’ve had these lasted the least amount of time. It really bums me out that apple would make a product like this.😕
customer_reviews.author: Denecia Jones

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these once before and they worked fine... for a while. They just stopped working one day so I didn’t think much of it. Going back to school this semester I thought I might grab some headphones because I like to study with music on. Took them out of the box and plugged them into my phone and they just didn’t work. I restarted my phone, followed lots of stuff online to try to fix it but they must be fake. Don’t waste your money on these. If you want real ones pay a few extra bucks at the Apple store... so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Weaver

product_meta.title: Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector - White
feature_bullets: Unlike traditional, circular earbuds, the design of the EarPods is defined by the geometry of the ear which makes them more comfortable for more people than any other earbud-style headphones
The speakers inside the EarPods have been engineered to maximize sound output and minimize sound loss, which means you get high-quality audio
The EarPods with lightning connector also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a pinch of the cord
Works with all devices that have a lightning connector and support iOS 10 or later, including iPod touch, iPad, and iPhone
